title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Montmorency Forest, France
content:
Photo submitted by Nicolas JeJoumal, “Photo prise au Château de la Chasse/Forêt de Montmorency/France. Les neiges du week-end dernier ont persisté au sol grâce au température négatives qui ont suivi. C’était l’occasion encore de mettre à l’épreuve les pneus René Herse Steilacoom Endurance sur le Specialized Diverge Sport 2019.”

English translation: “Photo taken at Château de la Chasse / Montmorency Forest / France. The snow from last weekend persisted on the ground thanks to the negative temperatures that followed. This was another opportunity to put the René Herse Steilacoom Endurance tires to the test on the 2019 Specialized Diverge Sport.”

We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

*Please note that public spaces and parks may have restrictions or be closed to the public due to COVID-19, please check before heading out.
author: Kristi Benedict
